titleStmt.title: The apprehensions of some poor observers of present dispensations, and providential actings imparted to the Lords remnant in the nations, for the provoking of them in this day of Jacobs trouble, to look unto their maker, and that their eyes may respect the Holy One of Israel

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Liverwell Chapman at the Crown in Popes-Head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
